class.name: cobot_controllers/CartesianPoseController
class.description: A controller that executes motions based on cartesian poses

class.name: cobot_controllers/CartesianVelocityController
class.description: A controller that executes motions based on cartesian velocities

class.name: cobot_controllers/JointPositionController
class.description: A controller that executes motions based on joint positions

class.name: cobot_controllers/CartesianImpedanceController
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space. Compliance parameters and the equilibrium pose can be modified online with dynamic reconfigure and an interactive marker respectively.

class.name: cobot_controllers/ForceExampleController
class.description: A PI controller that applies a force corresponding to a user-provided desired mass in the z axis. The desired mass value can be modified online with dynamic reconfigure.
